issue.message: The server URL needs to be updated from a relative path '/v1.33' to a full, templated URL 'https://{your-docker-instance-domain}/api/v{api-version-number}' to allow for dynamic host and API version configuration.

repairs.action_taken: Updated the first server entry's URL from '/v1.33' to 'https://{your-docker-instance-domain}/api/v{api-version-number}'. Added variables 'your-docker-instance-domain' with a default of 'localhost:2375' and 'api-version-number' with a default of '1.33' and an enum of supported versions, to provide flexibility in configuring the Docker Engine API endpoint.
